name: Animated Instrument
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Trouble Clef
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Orchestra Hit
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) thunder.

actions.name: Spirited Solo (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Improvises a tune to draw listeners into entrancing thought. Each creature within 30' of it that can hear the song: creature is incapacitated until end of its next turn (DC 12 Wis creature has an epiphany and gains advantage on Cha (Performance) checks for 1 day).

actions.name: Courageous Anthem (1/Day)
actions.desc: Plays a song that bolsters its allies. Each friendly creature within 30' of the instrument that can hear song has a +1 bonus to attack rolls ability checks and saves until song ends. Instrument must take a bonus action on subsequent turns to continue playing the song. Can stop playing at any time. Song ends if animated instrument is incapacitated. A creature can benefit from only one Courageous Anthem at a time.

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: Incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic instrument must succeed on a Con save vs. caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 min.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: False
special_abilities.desc: [+]Appearance[/+] While motionless and isn't flying indistinguishable from normal musical instrument.
